description: The Variegated Giant Dogwood (Cornus controversa 'Variegata') is an amazing show-stopper in any garden! With its unique mottled variegated foliage in shades of grey-green, cream, and yellow, and large white flowers, it certainly won't be overlooked. It offers immense seasonal interest with its vibrant leaves in the summer and fiery red stems in the winter. It's also extremely tough and resilient to almost any conditions, so you can be sure of a healthy, long-lived shrub. It makes a great specimen shrub and provides a great architectural presence to any garden.
